name: fr.jeanf.automaticdoorsystem
description:
A high-performance automatic door system using Unity ECS (Entities) with pooled audio and colliders.
Supports rotating and sliding doors, single and double configurations.
Features   distance-based culling, object pooling for AudioSources and BoxColliders, and seamless subscene integration for optimal performance with hundreds of doors.

samples.description: Ready-to-use doors with configuration & proper hierarchy, colliders, and trigger volumes configured.
Sample DoorAudioConfiguration assets with placeholder audio clip references.
Complete example scene demonstrating the door system setup with subscenes, DoorManagement, and DoorIdentifiers.
